definitions.definition: the use of the imagination or original ideas, especially in the production of an artistic work.
examples: inventiveness, imagination, innovation, innovativeness, originality, individuality; Moreartistry, inspiration, vision; enterprise, initiative, resourcefulness "her agency is a hotbed of youthful creativity"Moreartistry, inspiration, vision; enterprise, initiative, resourcefulness her agency is a hotbed of youthful creativity
